page.title: 15Buttercup Crafts JS
page.content:
Buttercup Crafts was opened in October 1983 in{Eppleby.}It is owned by{Mrs. {Harvey.}She has one part-time assistant.
They{sell}fresh flowers, silk flowers and hand-crafted goods for example lace, baskets, pottery etc. Their products are not all produced locally.
The{courses}they have last two to four days and some individual {classes}that last two hours. In that time they make lace, arrange flowers, paint and do spinning, weaving, and dyeing cloth. The{tutors}come from nearby and the{students}come from London, Manchester, Leeds, Edinburgh, Grimsby and Bournemouth as well as locally.
